Content Text: For Operators
Early detection of issues cross-vendor visibility and faster evidence-based responses.
The Compliance Layer Lotteries Trust
Lotteries operate under intense public scrutiny. Fortrix gives you provable regulator-grade transparency — so you're always ready for audit investigation or political review.
Purpose-built for the unique requirements of lottery operations — with support for draw oversight config controls reconciliation and approval workflows that stand up to scrutiny.
From audit prep to day-to-day oversight Fortrix automates the burden of documentation — giving your team more time to focus on performance and risk management.
Modules
Each Fortrix module runs on the core platform and can be used on its own or together as part of a full oversight solution.
Monitors system activity and flags unusual behavior.
Helps surface issues early
Works alongside vendor systems
Creates a tamper-evident record of system activity.
Supports audits and reviews
Preserves evidence over time
Gives regulators and operators a clear view into what happened.
Supports audit and review workflows
Designed for regulated environments
Fortrix Beacon
Detects anomalies patterns and risk signals across systems.
Purpose
Fortrix Beacon delivers real-time signals using rule-based logic risk scoring and alert automation. It gives oversight teams a clear view of emerging risks and operational exceptions.
Anomaly Detection
Detects unusual configurations or transaction flows that may indicate elevated risk.
Evidence-Based Response
Helps jurisdictions respond with evidence-based prioritization and review.
Integration
Integrates with Fortrix Ledger to provide context and a complete event history.
Fortrix Ledger
Immutable evidence engine for system-of-record integrity.
Purpose
Every critical event is captured with full attribution timestamping and reconciliation support — creating a verifiable audit trail for compliance review or investigation.
Benefits
Immutable event recording ensures audit logs cannot be altered or deleted.
Canonical source-of-truth timelines provide complete event reconstruction.
Segregation-of-duties enforcement maintains operational integrity and prevents conflicts.
Export-ready for auditors with structured formats supporting regulatory submissions.
Fortrix Retail
Provider-agnostic API and transaction verification layer.
Purpose
Fortrix Retail standardizes payloads and streamlines integrations across vendor systems enabling consistent oversight of transactions handoffs and reconciliations.
Works With CGS Vendors
Designed to integrate with vendor platforms through standardized interfaces reducing custom rework and making oversight and reconciliation smoother for everyone.
Monitoring
Optional performance and SLA monitoring to support operational oversight.
Security engineered for oversight.
Trust and security at Fortrix are built around independent verification defensible evidence and controls designed to stand up to regulatory scrutiny.
In regulated lottery environments confidence is built on evidence. Fortrix preserves a verifiable record of what happened when it happened and why even across complex multi-provider systems.
Fortrix operates as an independent control layer that complements operational and vendor systems supporting consistent oversight and increasing confidence in outcomes.
